short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser into a serene yet vibrant nightscape.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capturing the essence of a quiet city night, the theme showcases towering buildings with illuminated windows and soft purple-white lights that cut through the darkness. The contrast between the shadowy skyscrapers and subtle lighting creates a sophisticated urban atmosphere, perfect for users seeking a calm and modern browsing experience.
